files.description: Package initializer for the meta-analysis starter kit tooling.
Central configuration defining output paths, default template columns, and plotting/table settings for the starter kit.
Code to generate extraction_template.csv and screening_log.csv with required headers and example placeholder rows.
Analysis utilities that load the extraction template, compute a placeholder pooled estimate, produce a summary table, and render a forest plot.
Run logging helpers that capture environment details, timestamps, inputs/outputs, and save a single run log file to /outputs.
Single entrypoint script that creates /outputs/meta_analysis_starter_kit/ assets, runs the placeholder analysis once, writes outputs, and saves the run log.
CSV template for study-level data extraction including identifiers, effect size fields, and basic study characteristics.
CSV template for screening decisions with citation info, inclusion/exclusion reasons, and reviewer notes.
Notebook skeleton that loads the extraction template, runs the placeholder meta-analysis, and writes a summary table and forest plot to /outputs.

missionDescription: Create /outputs/meta_analysis_starter_kit/ with (a) extraction_template.csv, (b) screening_log.csv, and (c) analysis_skeleton (Rmd/py notebook) that loads the template, computes a placeholder pooled estimate, and writes a summary table + forest plot to /outputs; run once and save the run log.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator

projectName: /outputs/meta_analysis_starter_kit/ with (a) extraction_template.csv, (b) screening_log.csv, and (c) analysis_skeleton (Rmd/py notebook) that loads the template, computes a placeholder pooled estimate, and writes a summary table + forest plot to /outputs; run once and save the run log.
